TMO,Thermo Fisher profit tops Street with Life Tech contribution July 23 Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc, the world's largest maker of scientific instruments, reported a higher-than-expected second-quarter profit in its first full quarterly results to include its acquisition of genetic testing company Life Technologies Corp.

WHR,Whirlpool posts lower profit, cuts outlook on acquisition expensesUPDATE 2-Whirlpool cuts outlook as China sales plunge ahead of merger (Recasts, adds comments from CEO, analyst, updates shares)  UPDATE 2-Whirlpool cuts outlook as China sales plunge ahead of merger (Recasts, adds comments from CEO, analyst, updates shares) July 23 Whirlpool Corp on Wednesday reported a lower quarterly profit as sales fell in every region except North America. The company also cut its full-year earnings outlook, citing expenses from two pending acquisitions.UPDATE 2-Whirlpool cuts outlook as China sales plunge ahead of merger (Recasts, adds comments from CEO, analyst, updates shares)
